mapper.insert: insert into DB_COM_EQUCOM (EQU_COM_EQUIP, EQU_COM_EQNO, EQU_COM_KIND, EQU_COM_DATE, EQU_COM_DATA, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG) values (#{equComEquip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equComEqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equComKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equComDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{equComData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select EQU_COM_EQUIP, EQU_COM_EQNO, EQU_COM_KIND, EQU_COM_DATE, EQU_COM_DATA, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG from DB_COM_EQUCOM
